sentences.en: 'Israel ,'said Silver,'your head ain't much account , nor ever was.
sentences.cn: “ 伊斯利尔, ”希尔弗说, “ 你那脑袋真不开窍, 从来都是这样.

sentences.en: A newspaper criticized the president's proposal, saying that it was partial to Israel.
sentences.cn: 一家报纸批评总统的提议，称该提议偏袒以色列。

sentences.en: For example, people in Israel dip sweet apples into honey.
sentences.cn: 比如, 以色列人吃甜苹果蘸蜜.

sentences.en: Greece has established full diplomatic relations with Israel.
sentences.cn: 希腊已经和以色列建立了全面的外交关系。

sentences.en: He recited Israel losses during the war.
sentences.cn: 他列举了以色列在战争中的损失.

sentences.en: I think Israel tends to be at the leading edge of technological development.
sentences.cn: 我认为以色列在技术发展领域往往处于最前沿。

sentences.en: Israel accepted billions of dollars in war reparations.
sentences.cn: 以色列得到了几十亿美元的战争赔款。

sentences.en: Israel captured the territory in the 1967 War.
sentences.cn: 在1967年的战争中，以色列占领了这块领土。

sentences.en: Israel had originally wanted $1 billion in aid, but compromised on the $650 million.
sentences.cn: 以色列原本想要获得10亿美元的援助，但后来作出让步，同意接受6.5亿的援助。

sentences.en: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it, whatever colour they are and whichever language they speak.
sentences.cn: 犹太人只要愿意，均可自动加入以色列国籍，不管他们是什么肤色，不管他们说何种语言。

sentences.en: It would just be a continuation of previous visits he has made to Israel.
sentences.cn: 这不过是他之前对以色列访问的延续。

sentences.en: Jack dehorts me from visiting Israel.
sentences.cn: 杰克劝阻我出访以色列。

sentences.en: Life in Israel will continue as normal.
sentences.cn: 在以色列，生活将一如既往。

sentences.en: Mr Cook has arrived in Greece on the final stage of a tour which also included Egypt and Israel.
sentences.cn: 库克先生在行程的最后一站来到了希腊，他此行还包括了埃及和以色列。

sentences.en: Our only problem is with Israel.
sentences.cn: 我们的问题只是以色列。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has promised that Israel will play a constructive role.
sentences.cn: 首相承诺以色列将发挥积极的作用。

sentences.en: The problems of Israel, Lebanon, and the Gulf were tightly interlocked.
sentences.cn: 以色列、黎巴嫩与海湾的问题一环扣一环。

sentences.en: Why have you spelled Israel like this?
sentences.cn: 为什么你把以色列这么拼？
